```{=html}

<div class="container my-5">
  <h2 class="text-center fw-bold mb-4 text-success">üì• Install Instructions</h2>

  <p class="text-center mb-5 text-muted">
    TALL can be installed in two ways, depending on whether you want the stable version or the latest development version.<br>
    Make sure to have the latest version of <a href="https://cran.r-project.org/" target="_blank"><strong>R</strong></a> installed.
  </p>

  <div class="row justify-content-center align-items-start g-5">
    <!-- Stable version -->
    <div class="col-md-5 text-center">
      <i class="bi bi-download" style="font-size: 3rem; color: #4DB280;"></i>
      <h4 class="fw-bold mt-3">Stable Version</h4>
      <p class="text-muted small">
        Official release from <a href="https://cran.r-project.org/" target="_blank">CRAN</a>, updated monthly.
      </p>
      <pre class="bg-light p-3 rounded text-start"><code>if (!require("pak", quietly=TRUE)) install.packages("pak")
pak::pkg_install("tall")</code></pre>
    </div>

    <!-- Development version -->
    <div class="col-md-5 text-center">
      <i class="bi bi-download" style="font-size: 3rem; color: #4DB280;"></i>
      <h4 class="fw-bold mt-3">Development Version</h4>
      <p class="text-muted small">
        Install the latest development version directly from GitHub.
      </p>
      <pre class="bg-light p-3 rounded text-start"><code>if (!require("pak", quietly=TRUE)) install.packages("pak")
pak::pkg_install("massimoaria/tall")</code></pre>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!-- Run TALL -->
  <div class="mt-5 text-center aos-item" data-aos="fade-up">
    <h5 class="fw-bold text-success mb-3">‚ñ∂Ô∏è Run TALL</h5>
    <pre class="bg-light p-3 rounded d-inline-block text-start"><code>library("tall")
tall()</code></pre>
  </div>
</div>


```
